Rule.name: tst_HPServiceManagerIntegrationRule
Rule.Description: Use this rule to customize the data loaded into the provisioningPlan's integrationData object. The provisioningPlan and its integrationData object are used by Velocity to populate values in the XML templates for the web service calls.

Argument.name: identity
Argument.Description: A sailpoint.object.Identity representing the person being remediated.

Argument.name: context
Argument.Description: A sailpoint.api.SailPointContext object that can be used to query the database to find the Rule.

Argument.name: log
Argument.Description: A Log object to help report and/or debug the Rule.
